content.shortDescription: When his security company is attacked, Tony and Ziva must go on the run across Europe, try to figure out who is after them and maybe even learn to trust each other again so that they can finally have their unconventional happily ever after.
content.title: NCIS: Tony & Ziva

textRecommendations.headline: An emotionally-driven police procedural with chills and thrills
textRecommendations.body: If you want to understand human behavior, what it means to love and to trust then you should watch NCIS: Tony & Ziva. It explores what it means to live with your shadow comfortably. If you want thrills and chills and to understand terror in every way –  backwards, forwards, upside down and inside out –  then you need some Tony and Ziva in your life.
textRecommendations.bodyHTML: If you want to understand human behavior, what it means to love and to trust then you should watch NCIS: Tony & Ziva. It explores what it means to live with your shadow comfortably. If you want thrills and chills and to understand terror in every way – backwards, forwards, upside down and inside out – then you need some Tony and Ziva in your life.

profile.bio: Best known for his role as Anthony “Tony” DiNozzo in “NCIS” (2003–2016, 2024), Michael Weatherly is an actor, producer, and director. He starred as Logan Cale in the series “Dark Angel” (2000–2002), as well as guest starring on shows such as “Ally McBeal” (2000), “Charmed” (1999), and “JAG” (2003). He has reprised the role of “Tony” DiNozzo in “NCIS: New Orleans” (2014), “NCIS: Los Angeles” (2015), and “NCIS: Tony & Ziva” (2025).
